name: The Russian Roulette Game: PR
description:
Experience the Russian roulette game with friends with a small twist that will make the classic game more strategic and unpredictable, with some chaos involved in it...

Spice things up by incorporation special objects mid-round, offering advantages and disadvantages to players. Special objects such as a helmet that protects the players from the shot! or skip your turn if that's your way of doing things...


Shoot your fellas to win!


Every time you risk shooting yourself (and you don't die), you get a coin. The coin can then be used to strategically target and shoot other players.

Are you ready to paint the walls red?
